item.title: Refining Our Vision: Follow-up Meeting with EDP
item.description: Project Specifications Take Shape in Second EDP Meeting We’re making significant progress in our collaboration with EDP!

item.title: Expanding Our Drone Expertise: Consultation with Industry Specialist
item.description: Drone Technology Deep Dive with Industry Expert This week, our team had the valuable opportunity to meet with Diogo Henrique, a recognized expert in drone technology and operations.

item.title: Kickoff Meeting with EDP: Exploring Drone Automation for Power Line Inspection
item.description: EDP Partnership Begins: Revolutionizing Power Line Inspections We’re excited to announce the beginning of a promising collaboration with EDP!
